title: 4bed/2bath duplex w/ laundry, AC, outdoor space & .2 miles to Maverick
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 287397996', 'Rent: $4,500 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 3', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Be the first to live in this newly renovated four bedroom two full bath DUPLEX in the heart of Jeffries Point, Boston!', 'Open kitchen and living room layout with outdoor courtyard and just under 1500SF of living space!', 'The kitchen features light wood-colored modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and beautifully stained natural hardwood floors throughout.', 'All bedrooms include well-sized closets for extra storage and outlets on every wall.', 'This home offers washer and dryer in unit as well as central AC and forced hot air.', 'New plumbing, electrical, insulation and windows results in a highly efficient building and thus lower utility costs for tenants.', 'Parking Available for $100 extra', 'The Maverick T stop is less than two blocks from your doorstep, offering you easy transportation to the North End, Finance District and Seaport.', 'Hop on the water ferry and arrive in Charlestown or Seaport in just 7 minutes!', 'Surrounded by meticulously maintained green spaces such as Bremen Street & Piers Park.', ' Airport T stop is .2 from your front door and offers a free 24 hour shuttle to and from all major airline terminals.', 'Grocery, shopping, gyms/yoga studio and restaurants all within a few blocks from your front door.', '**NOTE** Unit is currently under construction.', 'Renderings are provided in order to illustrate the quality of finishes & materials that will be used.', 'Fixtures and features may vary depending on availability.', 'FEATURES', 'Backyard', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Outdoor space', 'Oven/Range', 'Private outdoor space', 'Refrigerator']
